body.div:
An index of the Emblems contained in this Volume.
The Authors epigrammeepigram
The Authors epistle
The Authors PræfacePreface to the Reader
Wind carrydcarried him to his belly
The earth is his NourceNurse
GoeGo to the woman washing cloathsclothes, and doedo you after the same manner.
JoyneJoin the brother with the sister and give them a cup of love
Put a toad upon the womans breasts, that sheeshe may give it suckesuck,
and the woman dyedie, and the toad be grossegross with milkemilk
Sow your gold in the white foliated earth
A chicken is flying out of the nest, which falls againeagain into the nest.
Take an eggeegg and smite it with a fiery sword
ShuttShut up the tree with the old man in the house of dew, and
eating of the fruit thereof heehe will become young
Give fire to fire, Mercury to Mercury, and you have enough
Whiten Latona, and tear your books
The stone, which SaturneSaturn vomited up, being devoured instead
of his SonneSon Jupiter, is placed in Helicon as a monument to men.
The Philosophers brassebrass is hydropicallhydropical, and desires to be seven
times washdwashed in a river, as Naaman the leper in Jordan
This is the Dragon which devouresdevours his tayletail
Let the workework of the Potter, consisting in siccity and moisture
instruct you
One LyonLion hathhas wings, the other none
FoureFour orbesorbs governegovern this workework of fire
Fire loves to burneburn, not to aurify, but gold
If you kill one of the four they will all suddenly dyedie
Nature teachethteaches nature how to subdue fire
Make of the man and the woman a circle, of that a quadrangle,
of this a triangle, of the same a circle, and you will have the Phil. Stone
Having acquired white lead doedo the workework of women, that is, boyleboil
When Pallas was borneborn, and Sol lay with Venue, it rained
gold at Rhodes
A wolfewolf devoured the King, and being burned restored him
to life againeagain
The dragon dyesdies not except heehe be killdkilled by his brother and
Sister, which are Sol and Luna
The tree of life is the fruit of humanehuman wisedomewisdom Page
HeeHe that endeavoursendeavors to enter into the Philosophers rosary
without a key, is like him that would walkewalk without feet
The King sitting in a bath is bathed, and freed from melan
choly by Pharut
As the Salamander lives in fire, soeso allsoalso the stone
Luna is as requisite to Sol as a hennehen to a cockecock
The King swimming in the Sea cryescries out with a loud voycevoice, heehe
that will deliver meeme shall have great reward
As CorallCoral growesgrows under water, and is hardened by the aireair, soeso allsoalso
is the Stone
The Hermaphrodite lying like a dead man in darknessedarkness, wants fire
HeeHe is conceived in baths, and borneborn in the aireair, and being made
red walks upon the waters
As Ceres accustomed Triptolemus, and Thetis Achilles to abide in
fire, soeso allsoalso dothdoes an Artist the stone
The stone, that is, Mercury is cast upon the earth, and exacted on moun
tains, and resides in the aireair, and is nourished in water
Three things are sufficient for the Magistery, the white fume, that is, water,
the green LyonLion, that is, the brassebrass of Hermes, and Aqua fætidafetida
Rebis is, as Hermaphroditus, produced from the two mountains of
Mercury and Venus
ŒdipusOedipus having overcome SphynxSphinx and killdkilled his father Laius, marryedmarried
his mother Jocaster
Of two waters make one, and that will be the water of sanctity
Adonis is killdkilled by a boar, to whom Venus hasting, tinged the roses with her blood
Nature, Reason, Experience, and Reading, must be the guide, staffestaff,
Spectacles, and lampelamp to him that is employdemployed in ChymicallChemical affairs
Give ear to the VultursVultures words which are no=wise false
Typhon kills OsyrisOsiris by deceiptdeceit, and dispersethdisperses the parts of his body on
all sides, but the famous Isis gathered them together
The workework is perfected by Sol and his shade
Two Eagles, come together, one from the East, the other from the West
A wolfewolf coming from the East, and a doggedog from the West worrydworried one another
The King falls sickesick by drinking water, and is restordrestored to
health by Physicians
The PhilosophicallPhilosophical infant is, as Orion, the SonneSon of three fathers
The Dragon kills the woman, and sheeshe him, and are both
bloody all over
Finis
